name: Deconstructed California Roll Sushi
author: Erin Pierson Barton
summary: Cheap and easy way to get that sushi taste you've been craving! Prep extra ahead of time so you can just pull it out of the fridge!
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked medium grain white rice
2 tablespoons teriyaki sauce, or more to taste
1 tablespoon black sesame seeds, or to taste
directions: Place in a saucepan and add water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes
Remove from the heat and cool to room temperature, 15 to 20 minutes
Divide ingredients evenly and layer onto 4 plates as follows: rice, crab, cucumber slices, and avocado slices
Drizzle teriyaki over each plate and sprinkle with sesame seeds
